description_text:
Hello. I bought a pedal from you. But now it doesn't receive a signal
anymore. It seems like the circuit is broken. Do you sell the circuit
separately?

conversations.body_text: Hi Thiên Phạm Nguyễn Trung,  Please uninstall the old version from your computer and install the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 from the provided link. After connecting the device, if you see a message saying “Version too old, not supported” or Simsonn Flasher mode, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-plus.sfu to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, make sure to recalibrate the pedals, as they will not function properly in games without calibration.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link

Hi Thiên Phạm Nguyễn Trung,  The control box of your pedals is version 1.7.0, which does not support upgrading to SIMSONN Manager. You can only use the SimConfigPedals v3.5 software for configuration and operation.          https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download  ​   You can also download FreeJoy 1.7.0 and use the recovery file to restore the pedals.   ​   https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link  ​   ​   If you are not comfortable performing the operation yourself, you can install the ToDesk software. Registration is not required — if it prompts you to register, simply click the close button in the upper-right corner to skip.  Once installed, please provide us with your ID and temporary password, and let us know a convenient time in your local city. We will then remotely assist you with the inspection and recovery.   ​   https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe
